name: Nyfward
tagline: Odd spatial distortions. Trees and rocks change size when travellers blink. Already traversed paths repeat.
description: Odd spatial distortions. Trees and rocks change size when travellers blink. Already traversed paths repeat.

points_of_interest.name: Nyfward
points_of_interest.description: A slender, crooked, windowless tower of stone at the river bank. It impossibly ascends hundreds of yards into the sky, and yet is not visible from a distance. A yawning arch at ground level provides entry.
points_of_interest.entering: A yawning arch at ground level provides entry.
points_of_interest.interior: Ground floor: A marble lion-head fountain burbles. In the pool at the fountain's base, reflections of jovial, peering manticores can be seen. Upper floors: The size and contents of each floor magically change each time the tower is explored.
points_of_interest.exploring: A spiral stair ascends from each floor to the next. No matter how high PCs ascend, they never reach the top of the tower. Roll on the Encounters and Rooms tables for each floor entered.
points_of_interest.inhabitants: The strange tower was built by the legendary arch-wizard Nyf Nimbly, who is said to reside in a magical workshop at its (unreachable) summit.

roll_tables.name: Encounters
roll_tables.description: Roll when entering a new floor

entries.title: None
entries.description: Empty room.

entries.title: Monster
entries.description: Roll a dungeon encounter (p98).
entries.mechanical_effect: Roll on the dungeon encounter table (p98), treating the tower's floor number as the dungeon level, with a maximum level of 7. Also make a Reaction Roll and roll on the Monster Activities table

entries.title: Special
entries.description: Roll on the Special Encounters table.

entries.title: Special + monster
entries.description: Roll as above.

entries.title: Library
entries.description: Nonsense, obscure arcana, or erotic verse.

entries.title: Study
entries.description: Leather couches, roaring fire, plush rugs.

entries.title: Banquet hall
entries.description: Syrupy fruits, boar heads, fine wine.

entries.title: Bedroom
entries.description: Four-poster bed, furs, arcane tapestries.

entries.title: Conservatory
entries.description: Jungle plants, dark soil, lambent orbs.

entries.title: Planetarium
entries.description: Alien star maps, illusory orreries.
Playing cards.
Napping.
Sipping tea.
Philosophising.
Bathing in milk.
Blowing smoke rings.
Playing the flute.
Nibbling biscuits.
Pacing nervously.
Preening.
Singing operatically.
Dusting.

roll_tables.name: Special Encounters
roll_tables.description: These rooms contain treasure hidden among the furnishings: 1d20 × 100gp and a 2-in-6 chance of a random magic item

entries.description: Animated furniture dancing silently.
Jars of candy. If eaten, Save Versus Doom or die.
entries.mechanical_effect: If eaten, Save Versus Doom or die

entries.description: Steamy atmosphere. Potted plants. 1d3 giant, carnivorous plants (as giant leech—DMB) attack intruders.
Household implements (cutlery, quills, needles and thread, fire pokers, etc.) flying in formation.
Pink vapour blocks ascent. If traversed, Save Versus Doom or be polymorphed into a pig for 1d6 days.
entries.mechanical_effect: If traversed, Save Versus Doom or be polymorphed into a pig for 1d6 days

entries.description: Walls covered with manticore head carvings.
Stone manticore head emits a deafening roar: Save Versus Doom or be deafened for 1d6 Turns.
entries.mechanical_effect: Save Versus Doom or be deafened for 1d6 Turns

entries.description: 3′ brass bowls magically filled with meat and water.
Raging teapot automaton (as wicker giant—DMB).
1d3 manticores (DMB). Roll on Monster Activities.
Copper vat of bubbling, steaming water and herbs.
Floating rune, glowing red. Anyone entering must Save Vs. Spell or be transported to the ground floor.
entries.mechanical_effect: Save Vs. Spell or be transported to the ground floor

entries.description: Vats of hybrid animals suspended in green liquid.
Fancy hats. If worn, Save Vs. Spell or dance for 2 hours.
entries.mechanical_effect: If worn, Save Vs. Spell or dance for 2 hours

entries.description: Ethereal music. Save Versus Spell or entranced for 1d4 Turns. 2-in-6 chance per Turn of a monster arriving.
entries.mechanical_effect: Save Versus Spell or entranced for 1d4 Turns. 2-in-6 chance per Turn of a monster arriving

entries.description: 1d4 levers. Roll 1d4 for each one pulled: 1. PCs transported to the ground floor, 2. PCs transported 1d6 floors higher, 3. Secret treasure cache opens (a piece of jewellery and a random magic item), 4. Gravity reverses in the tower for 1d6 Turns.
entries.mechanical_effect: Roll 1d4 for each lever pulled: 1. PCs transported to ground floor, 2. PCs transported 1d6 floors higher, 3. Secret treasure cache opens, 4. Gravity reverses for 1d6 Turns

entries.description: A statue of a snake-headed woman. If touched, Save Versus Spell or become obsessed with marrying her.
entries.mechanical_effect: If touched, Save Versus Spell or become obsessed with marrying her

entries.description: Huge oil painting of Lake Longmere. Any who touch it are transported to the Isle of Yeth (hex 0505).
entries.mechanical_effect: Any who touch it are transported to the Isle of Yeth (hex 0505)

entries.description: Noble portraits goad and mock PCs.

A moustachioed woman dressed in green silk, claims to be Nyf Nimbly. Congratulates PCs, grants them one wish, then vanishes. PCs appear outside the tower. If they return, they henceforth find the tower empty.
entries.mechanical_effect: Grants one wish, then PCs appear outside tower. If they return, tower is empty

special_features: No matter how high PCs ascend, they never reach the top of the tower

npcs.description: A moustachioed woman dressed in green silk, claims to be Nyf Nimbly. The legendary arch-wizard who built the tower and is said to reside in a magical workshop at its (unreachable) summit.
